title: Chamizal National Memorial: Ranger Programs
body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit     Things To Do     Ranger Programs              Ranger Programs        Ranger giving talk to scout group in the mini-theater. NPS   Â    Park rangers are here to help you understand, appreciate and take care of your park. All programs and activities hosted by our rangers are free. Listed below are programs that are offered on a regular basis. However, due to staffing and other events, the schedule may change. For up-to-date schedule information, visit our calendar of events or call the Cultural Center at 915-532-7273. Junior Ranger Saturday On the third Saturday of each month from 11:00 a.m. to 12:00 p.m. kids ages 5-11 are invited to come have fun while learning about nature, cultures and Chamizal National Memorial history with a park ranger. Activities vary and may include games, walks, experiments and crafts. Meet at the Cultural Center information desk. Please note that Chamizal National Memorial also has a self-guided Junior Ranger program with the Junior Ranger booklet in English and in Spanish. It is free and available for all ages while the Cultural Center is open daily from 10:00 a.m. to 5:00 p.m. Tales, Tails &Tots On the fourth Saturday of each month from 11:00 to 11:30 a.m. kids ages 3-6 are invited to spend story time with our mascot Chami and a park ranger. Enjoy new tales every month, from animals to adventures to ancient peoples. Meet at the Cultural Center information desk. Facilitated Dialogue Series Once a month, one of our rangers will host an experience which can vary from watching a movie to walking around the park. After the activity, all of the participants are guided through a group conversation related to the topic of that experience. The purpose of this type of program is to give our visitors an opportunity to share the knowledge, feelings and experiences which can be related to the Chamizal story. These programs are a lot of fun because when everyone joins in the dialogue, we all learn so much more.
